title: DDFP 325: Super Bowl XLIX pick

description:
Live from Arizona, Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Drew "Stat-on" Christensen for one final "Red ️Challenge Flag Picks" segment to decide between the Seahawks and Patriots.
